title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
Join our team to take charge of full-funnel ad campaigns on Meta, Google, and TikTok. You will be responsible for budget allocation, ad performance tracking, and working alongside content teams to deliver impactful creatives.

Requirements:

1+ year of experience with Facebook/Google Ads

Analytical mindset and experience with A/B testing

Familiar with performance goals (CTR, ROAS, Conversion Rate)

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
